page.title: 17Business Computers in Maltby
page.content: A number of shops in Maltby use computers to help their business. Our local newsagent has installed a computer to help him with stock control and to sort out monthly wages as well as organising his paper rounds.The computer also helps by printing out the customers' bills. The computer is also a cash register and contains the takings for the day. It cost over Â£4000. The discs cost Â£40 for 10. The chemist's shop in Maltby High Street also uses a computer. In this shop, it is used to print out the labels on prescriptions. The computer will soon be used to re-order drugs etc: by telephone line which will make the system much quicker. Many other companies in Maltby use computers to make their business more efficient.
